bulletin1.title: Bulletin Board now Auto-Updates
bulletin1.label: label-info
bulletin1.author: Matthew Wang
bulletin1.content: Short update, but the bulletin now actually pulls requests from the server. That means this bulletin will update you on the latest releaes, news, and other tidbits, regardless of your Awesome Suite version (as long as it is 0.4.0+). Have fun!

bulletin2.title: Version 0.3.0 Released!
bulletin2.label: label-success
bulletin2.author: Matthew Wang
bulletin2.content: Man, this release looks pretty awesome! I've added a quadratic solver, this very bulletin, touched up on some UI elements, and squashed a few bugs and inefficiencies. You can find a full changelog here. Until next time!

bulletin3.title: Welcome to the Bulletin Board
bulletin3.label: label-info
bulletin3.author: Matthew Wang
bulletin3.content: Hey there, this is the Awesome Suite Bulletin! Here, I'll post release notes, news about the app, and some helpful tips and tricks about the suite. Right now, this is all manual, but eventually I'll work on making this fetch off of a server and being automatic!
